程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim

类 VmAllocationPolicy

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
直接已知子类:
NetworkVmAllocationPolicy, PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract, VmAllocationPolicySimple
public abstract class VmAllocationPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
VmAllocationPolicy is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of hosts to virtual machines in a Datacenter. It allocates hosts for placing VMs. It supports two-stage commit of reservation of hosts: first, we reserve the host and, once committed by the user, it is effectively allocated to he/she.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

    • allocateHostForVm

      public abstract boolean allocateHostForVm​(Vm vm)
      Allocates a host for a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - the VM to allocate a host to
      返回:
      $true if the host could be allocated; $false otherwise

    • allocateHostForVm

      public abstract boolean allocateHostForVm​(Vm vm, Host host)
      Allocates a specified host for a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - virtual machine which the host is reserved to
      host - host to allocate the the given VM
      返回:
      $true if the host could be allocated; $false otherwise
